title: CYLINDERS, PISTONS OR CASINGS, FOR COMBUSTION ENGINES; ARRANGEMENTS OF SEALINGS IN COMBUSTION ENGINES
Cylinders; Cylinder heads
informative_references: Cylinders and cylinder heads in general
definition_statement: This place covers: Cylinders and cylinder heads for combustion engines

title: {Integrally formed cylinders and cylinder heads}
definition_statement: This place covers: All applications of a single piece forming the cylinder and the cylinder head.

title: having cooling means  (cylinder heads F02F1/26)
informative_references: Cooling of cylinders or cylinder heads in general and

title: for air cooling
informative_references: Air cooling of cylinders and cylinder heads
definition_statement: This place covers: Means for air cooling of cylinder heads

title: running-liner and cooling-part of cylinder being different parts or of different material
definition_statement: This place covers: Running-liner and cooling-part of cylinder being different parts or of different material: Only for air cooled engines, e.g. different materials used for the liners and the cooling fins.

title: for liquid cooling
informative_references: Liquid cooling of cylinders and cylinder heads

title: {Siamese-type cylinders, i.e. cylinders cast together}
informative_references: Arrangement for cooling cylinders or cylinder heads
definition_statement: This place covers: Siamese-type cylinders, i.e. cylinders cast together:

title: Preventing corrosion of liquid-swept surfaces
informative_references: Engines with means for preventing corrosions of gas swept spaces
definition_statement: This place covers: All measures taken for combating corrosion in water cooled engines.

title: {for use in engines with two or more pistons reciprocating within same cylinder}
{particularly for three or more inlet valves}
informative_references: Mechanisms for driving three or more intake valves per cylinder

title: {with a separate deviation element inside the channel}
definition_statement: This place covers: Separate deviation element inside the intake channel. E.g. a butterfly valve or an insert placed just before the valve seat.

title: {with liners  (F02F1/4257, F02F1/4271 take precedence)}
definition_statement: This place covers: Liners in both intake and exhaust channel.

title: Pistons
definition_statement: This place covers: Pistons for combustion engines:

title: having cooling means
informative_references: Air cooling arrangements for pistonsLiquid cooling arrangements for pistons
definition_statement: This place covers: Structural features, e.g. fins, apertures and arrangements for dissipating heat

title: the fluid being liquid
definition_statement: This place covers: Liquid cooling means:

title: Piston rings, e.g. associated with piston crown {(not used see F16J9/00)}
Casings, e.g. crankcases {or frames}
definition_statement: This place covers: Combustion engine casings, e.g. crankcases or frames, e.g. rigid supports for cylinders or crankcases.

title: {Sound insulation}
informative_references: Acoustic insulation for internal-combustion piston engines or combustion engines in general

title: Arrangements of sealings in combustion engines   (piston rings  {F16J9/00})
definition_statement: This place covers: Arrangement of sealings in combustion engines
